title: The Legend of Korra Season 4
alternative_title: Avatar: Legend of Korra; The Legend of Korra (Book 4:Balance)
description: Book Four is set three years after the previous season. It deals with Avatar Korra's journey of self-discovery following the physical and psychological injuries she incurred in the fight with Zaheer, and with unrest in the Earth Kingdom where Kuvira, formerly an officer in Suyin Beifong's service, seeks to seize power by military force.
